description.zh-cn: 中国作家，原上海作家协会副主席，《萌芽》杂志主编，全国新概念作文大赛主要创办人。
description.en: Chinese writer, former vice-chairman of the Shanghai Writers Association, editor-in-chief of Mengya magazine, and a main founder of the National New Concept Composition Competition.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省下辖的副省级市、计划单列市。
description.en: A sub-provincial city and a city with separate planning status in Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市。
description.en: A direct-administered municipality of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 华东师范大学第一附中

zh-cn: 华东师范大学第一附中

description.zh-cn: 位于上海市的一所高级中学。
description.en: A senior high school located in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国悬疑小说作家，赵长天之子。
description.en: Chinese suspense novelist, son of Zhao Changtian.

description.zh-cn: 上海市文学艺术界联合会和中国作家协会的团体会员。
description.en: A group member of the Shanghai Federation of Literary and Art Circles and the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 一份由上海市作家协会主办的青年文学刊物。
description.en: A youth literary magazine sponsored by the Shanghai Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 由《萌芽》杂志社主办的全国性文学赛事。
description.en: A national literary competition hosted by Mengya magazine.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization formed voluntarily by writers of all ethnic groups in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 赵长天出生于浙江省宁波市。
description.en: Zhao Changtian was born in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province.

relationships.target: 华东师范大学第一附中

description.zh-cn: 赵长天毕业于华东师范大学第一附中。
description.en: Zhao Changtian graduated from the No. 1 High School Affiliated to East China Normal University.
Na Duo is the son of Zhao Changtian.

description.zh-cn: 赵长天曾任上海作家协会副主席。
description.en: Zhao Changtian served as the Vice Chairman of the Shanghai Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 赵长天曾任《萌芽》杂志主编。
description.en: Zhao Changtian served as the editor-in-chief of Mengya magazine.

description.zh-cn: 赵长天是全国新概念作文大赛的主要创办人。
description.en: Zhao Changtian was a main founder of the National New Concept Composition Competition.

description.zh-cn: 赵长天是中国作家协会会员，并曾任第五、六、七届全国委员会委员。
description.en: Zhao Changtian was a member of the China Writers Association and served on its 5th, 6th, and 7th National Committees.

description.zh-cn: 赵长天是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Zhao Changtian was a member of the Communist Party of China.
